name: Lightning: Defend The Keep!
description:
DEFEND THE KEEP FROM THE FORCES OF ... Good? 

Dodge the enemies that charge towards you so that they fall in to the trap. 

Move left and right to avoid being run down but the knights.

If you feel a bit slow, press the space bar to give yourself a magical kick up the butt to get out the way of stampeding enemies! 

This is my first game, following online tutorials, it was great fun to make (even if it is super simple...). On to the next one! 

SFX:
